meaningMnemonic: If the air is <kanji>muddy</kanji> and <kanji>dirty</kanji> it's because there is too much <vocabulary>pollution</vocabulary> in that area. You should wear a mask and be careful of <vocabulary>contamination</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
